channel.title: Strange client bug
channel.description:
every time i try to add an item, the client adds it succesfully but when i wear the item, a null apears on my inventory and when i unequip the item it disappears and gets replaced with another null? which means:
custom = nullx2 minus custom
never happend before, hope you hardcore coders out there knows what to do, cuz im lost

item.title: Strange client bug
item.dc:creator: @rafikd rafikd
item.description:
@rafikd wrote:

i already added the Ints in class8.java, even though i say: add model ***** its still getting nulls, its really weird

Read full topic

item.title: Strange client bug
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Add the item in class8.java or something with the ints, don’t know but I’m sure that’s how you do it. Haven’t touched a client in months. Might not be right but have a look around in class8.java and see if it’s still a null after you added it there.

Read full topic
